deleteDialog.message: Are you sure you want to delete this hub? All catalogs, attributes and elements will be permanently removed.

deleteDialog.message: Are you sure you want to delete this catalog? All attributes and elements will be permanently removed.

deleteDialog.fetchBlockingError: Failed to check for blocking references
deleteDialog.hasBlockingReferences: Cannot delete catalog. The following references from other catalogs must be removed first:

catalogs.deleteMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this catalog? This action cannot be undone.
